page.title: 05Central Garage.
page.content: Mr.Harwood's garage is opposite the Church and he has been the owner for the last 21 years. It has mainly white walls and the windows and doors are painted blue. It has a tarmac floor and the sweet shop is on the left hand side. He has 2 big workshops on the right as well as a little wall. He sells Butler petrol and it is a Vehicle Testing Station for the Ministry of Transport. We all asked 2 questions. He said that he sold about 250 gallons each day, but on a Tuesday sometimes even more. He always wanted to be his own boss so he is very happy in his work. He said that he often sold sweets to the children at weekends. We all thought that he was a clever builder because he added his own house onto the Garage building.
